dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria Germanica".
Legend (see Image 3): Erklarung Nach: Volgender Laichen.
Decorative cartouches and border, coat of arms, descriptive text, winds, allegorical figures, cities.
A revised version of Philipp Apian's Bairische Landtafeln, 1568.
